member.name: T:ServiceStack.Caching.Memcached.MemcachedClientCache
member.summary:
A memcached implementation of the ServiceStack ICacheClient interface. Good practice not to have dependencies on implementations in your business logic.
Basically delegates all calls to Enyim.Caching.MemcachedClient with added diagnostics and logging.

member.name: M:ServiceStack.Caching.Memcached.MemcachedClientCache.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes the Cache using the default configuration section (enyim/memcached) to configure the memcached client

member.name: M:ServiceStack.Caching.Memcached.MemcachedClientCache.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.String})
member.summary: Initializes the Cache using the provided hosts to configure the memcached client

member.summary: Prepares a MemcachedClientConfiguration based on the provided ipEndpoints.
